Estrangement
For purposes of this chapter, a Veteran and spouse are
estranged
if they live apart because of marital discord.
A Veteran and spouse are
not
considered estranged if the Veteran demonstrates that there are other reasons for the separation.Â  For example, the spouses live apart because of family obligations or for medical reasons.
